DOC.brief_summary: This sample collection study , participant require collect one ( last menstrual period ≥12 month ) two ( last menstrual period < 12 month ) urine sample return study site , together collection sample information . Participants menstrual cycle within last 6 month also require provide follow-up information pregnancy status date next menstrual bleed .
DOC.brief_title: Urine Sample Collection From Non Pregnant Peri Post-menopausal Women
DOC.detailed_description: Each subject provide urine sample collection container , transport container , barcode label , prepay envelope full set study instruction , together material require facilitate collection follow-up urine sample completion follow form , applicable . Subjects admit study unsure pregnancy status provide market Clearblue HPT , test pregnancy prior begin study . If subject informs trial site become pregnant prior urine sample collection , withdrawn study urine sample collect . The subject return material study site , co-ordinator complete exit form . Subjects require collect urine sample , label sample ( soon collect ) appropriate bar-coded label provide return study site . Where possible return sample soon collect , urine sample must store domestic fridge container provide maximum 1 week send study site early convenience . Subjects receive follow-up establish pregnancy status unless ≥ 12 month last menstrual period ( LMP ) . On completion study , subject reimburse participation . It anticipate sample collection carry remotely ( i.e . volunteer home ) volunteer may attend study site sample collection require .
DOC.criteria: Known pregnant , Willing give consent Pregnant breastfeeding , Pregnant within last 2 month , Having treatment infertility , Taken hormonal contraception contain hCG last month , Using hormonal contraception within last month , Previously take part sample collection study SDP ( provide 17 sample ) .
